title: dhiranA nAdira tanOmtana (t)
sahitya:
dhiranA nAdiranA tanOmtana 


anupallavi

  dhiranA nAdira tillAna diranA tillAna diranA tillAna diranA 


caraNam    dhru tillAna dhru dhru tillAna tillillAna 
				(tisram)
tadingiNatOm tadingiNatOm takatiku tadingiNatOm
mayakkum muraLI tillAna ishaikku viyakkum vaNNam tai dhittit tai 
nAnADuvEn kaNNA vA nI kaNNA vA vA
			(repeat carana passage, then pallavi)
